abstract: A 1217 version of the Magna Carta, along with the only known surviving copy of the King’s Writ of 1215, the instructions that King John issued at Runnymede on how to carry out the charter, will be at the New-York Historical Society.

headline.main: A Magna Carta Exhibition at New-York Historical Society

snippet: A 1217 version of the Magna Carta, along with the only known surviving copy of the King’s Writ of 1215, the instructions that King John issued at Runnymede on how to carry out the charter, will be at the New-York Historical Society.
